remarks: One-to-one relationship for division.  (Contributed by Jim Kingdon, 2-Mar-2020.)
statement:
divcld.1 $e |- ( ph -> A e. CC ) $.
divcld.2 $e |- ( ph -> B e. CC ) $.
divmuld.3 $e |- ( ph -> C e. CC ) $.
divassapd.4 $e |- ( ph -> C # 0 ) $.
div11apd.5 $e |- ( ph -> ( A / C ) = ( B / C ) ) $.
div11apd $p |- ( ph -> A = B ) $.
